recommended_degree: Teknik Listrik, Teknik Mesin, Teknik Elektro, Teknik Mekatronika (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
1.Basic understanding of mechanical, electrical, or civil engineering principles. 
2.Knowledge of preventive and predictive maintenance programs. 
3.Familiar with AutoCAD, SolidWorks, PLC programming, or relevant engineering software. 
4.Familiar with quality control, safety & environmental regulations, and ISO standards. 
5.Knowledge of budgeting, cost estimation, and project management tools. 
6.Ability to supervise technicians/operators. 
7.Strong problem-solving and analytical skills. 
8.High attention to detail and commitment to safety. 
9.A strong commitment to reducing plastic waste and promoting eco-friendly solutions.
